title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building High-Performance, Secure networks for Hybrid and Multicloud (HMC209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建高性能、安全的混合云和多云网络 (HMC209)
abstract: Enterprise data and AI workloads are more distributed, and more valuable —and more mobile—than ever. Training AI models, running inference at scale, migrating workloads, or sharing datasets across hybrid and multicloud environments, requires a network built for security, performance, flexibility, and cost control. In this session, we’ll share best practices for building hybrid and multicloud architectures that ensure your data is in the right place, at the right time—without unnecessary risk. You’ll walk away with best practices for selecting the right networking constructs for mission critical, hybrid multicloud connectivity. This presentation is brought to you by Equinix, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业数据和AI工作负载比以往任何时候都更加分布式、更有价值，也更具流动性。训练AI模型、大规模运行推理、迁移工作负载或在混合云和多云环境中共享数据集，都需要一个为安全性、性能、灵活性和成本控制而构建的网络。在本次会议中，我们将分享构建混合云和多云架构的最佳实践，确保您的数据在正确的时间出现在正确的位置——而不会带来不必要的风险。您将了解到为关键任务混合多云连接选择正确网络构造的最佳实践。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Equinix为您呈现。
